hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT new fixed_renewaldto ( fr.AcctNo, fr.Rno, fr.RDate, fr.Desp, fr.MDate, fr.Amount, fr.Renstat, fr.ToAccountNo, fr.Cur ) From MNMVIW00081 as fr Where CONVERT(char(10),fr.RDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and fr.Cur = :cur and fr.Active=true and Accruedstatus = :accruedstatus and fr.SourceBr = :sourceBr order by fr.AcctNo,fr.RDate,fr.Rno
